summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5550 for the improvement of Hinds Street, from 1st Avenue South to the center of Block 348, Seattle Tide Lanes; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 71612 as amended by Ordinance No. 71809, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
